title: How many American servicemen died in WWII? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Although the United States sustained approximately 416,000 armed forces deaths during WWII. This total included those who died while serving in the Navy, Marines, Army, Merchant Marines, And Army Air Corp. The answer to the question of “ how many American soldiers were killed in WW2” is approximately 318,200 soldiers died while serving in the military during World War Two. Please be mindful that theses deaths included the Army Air Corp which was a part of the Army. It should also be noted that the military did not distinguish between combat related and accidental deaths. Research Starters: US Military by the Numbers | The National WWII Museum | New Orleans
